auto_advance: Questions will auto-advance when time expires
question: Question
access_via_link: Access via the join link above
enter_test_code: Or visit the app and enter test code

connection_lost: Connection lost. Please check your internet connection.

name_conflict_text: Someone else is using this name. Please choose another name.

finish_test_confirm_text: This will end the test for all participants.
name_required: Please enter a name with at least 2 characters.
check_information: Please check your information and try again.

test_in_progress: This test session is currently in progress.
test_code_invalid: No test found with this code. Please check the code and try again.
test_scheduled_wait: This test is scheduled but has not started yet. Please wait for the scheduled start time.

manage_view_results: Manage and view test results for your department
test_completed_desc: Great job! You've finished the test.
please_wait: Please wait for the scheduled start time
